title: Heavy Duty Combined Cleaning (sifter) Integrated Flour mill Machine EPC provider: www.immy.cn

subtasks: Approach the pesticide container.
Lift the pesticide container onto the sprayer.
Connect the pesticide container to the sprayer's hose.
Adjust the sprayer settings for appropriate coverage.
Start the sprayer engine or pump.
Walk through the crops, aiming the sprayer nozzle.
Move the sprayer's nozzle to cover the entire area.
Continue spraying until the pesticide coverage is even.

tasks.task: Fuel the sprayer for the day’s work.
subtasks: Locate the fueling station or refill point.
Open the sprayer’s fuel tank.
Connect the fuel hose to the sprayer.
Pour or pump fuel into the tank.
Close the fuel valve once the tank is full.
Check for any leaks after refueling.
Identify the clogged nozzle on the sprayer.
Turn off the sprayer and disconnect the nozzle.
Soak the clogged nozzle in a cleaning solution.
Use a cleaning brush to remove blockage.
Rinse the nozzle thoroughly with clean water.
Reconnect the nozzle and test spray.

tasks.task: Unload field crop into a grain bin.
subtasks: Drive the combine harvester to the grain bin.
Position the combine's auger over the grain bin opening.
Engage the unloading mechanism on the combine.
Monitor the grain flow into the bin.
Stop the unloading when the bin is full.
Disengage the unloading mechanism and close the bin.

tasks.task: Replace a broken brake pedal on a tractor.
subtasks: Locate a spare brake pedal or replacement part.
Align the new pedal with the existing mounting points.
Secure the new pedal using appropriate hardware.
Reconnect any electrical connections if applicable.
Test the brake response by operating the pedal.
